entry.title: MathIsFun0/Cryptid
entry.summary:
An unbalanced Balatro mod

Cryptid

An unbalanced Balatro mod. Note that this is currently a heavy work in progress.

Note: Cryptid requires Steamodded 1.0.0-Alpha and Talisman.

Cryptid currently adds:

  • 107 new jokers
  • 43 new decks
  • 24 new stakes
  • 20 new boss blinds
  • 18 new code cards
  • 18 new vouchers
  • 9 new spectral cards
  • 9 new tags
  • 7 new challenges
  • 5 new editions
  • 4 new planet cards
  • 4 new booster packs
  • 2 new joker rarities
  • 2 new tarot cards
  • 1 new consumable type
  • 1 new enhancement
  • 1 new seal

Official Discord

Video Installation Guide
